title: Conservation graph is inverted for hits on - strand
Tree estimation fails on short alignment
body:
For the the following alignment we can't calculate the background model and phyml gives this strange warning and asks for a user input "type any key to exit" which is super annoying. 

```
 a score=0

 s mm9.chr2 94496640 4 + 0 GAAA

 s hg18.chr11 91392746 4 - 0 GAAA

 s panTro2.chr11 90665046 4 - 0 GAAA

 s rheMac2.chr14 28971164 4 + 0 GAAA

 s canFam2.chr18 29504980 4 + 0 GAAA
```

title: The package does not compile on a Mac
body:
The package does not compile on a Mac apparently because  of a malloc.h include in weight.c. 

Possible fix by Lars Barquist:

```
#if defined(__APPLE__)
#include <stdlib.h>
#else
#include <malloc.h>
#endif
```

We don't use weight.c at the moment so we probably just remove the file from the Makefile.

title: Strand information in MAF files is ignored.
body:
The reference sequence is always interpreted to be in the "+" direction even though it might be "-" in the MAF input. The GTF output is not correct in this scenario. 

In practice this should not be a problem, because the reference sequence in MAF files is usually in the plus direction.

title: Add Galaxy wrapper
body:
This is a tracking bug to let RNAcode users know that we are working on a Galaxy wrapper.

xref: https://github.com/bgruening/galaxytools/issues/137

title: Missing git tags for recent release(s)
body:
Currently I only see git tags `Pre1` and `0.2-beta`.

Which source code went into the 0.3 release?
http://github.com/downloads/wash/rnacode/RNAcode-0.3.tar.gz

title: Accept '.' as gap character
body:
'.' is frequently used as gap character. 

Should be easy to add: 

https://github.com/wash/rnacode/blob/fe20868df016f3be20351bcbdcecd89cb4d65003/phyml/utilities.c#L4484

and here

https://github.com/wash/rnacode/blob/fe20868df016f3be20351bcbdcecd89cb4d65003/phyml/utilities.c#L4521



Error output is currently also not very helpful: 

`Unknown character state : ï¿½`

title: Err. in Optimize_Br_Len_Serie
body:
For the hg38 7 way alignment RNAcode fails with: 

```
. 0.000010 0.000001 0.000001 0.000001
. 0.000000 -- -2.983187
. Err. in Optimize_Br_Len_Serie

. Type any key to exit.
```

title: mixing of errors and output if output goes to stdout
body:
If --outfile is not specified error messages and output are mixed. This is because some messages also go to stdout: 

- `. 26 sites are made from completely undetermined states ('X', '-', '?' or 'N')...`
- ```
. 0.000010 0.000001 0.000001 0.000001
. 0.000000 -- -3.616917
. Err. in Optimize_Br_Len_Serie
. Type any key to exit.
```

title: ./configure: No such file or directory
body:
Dear RNAcode team,

I am trying to install RNAcode but in the very first step it tells me that there is no configure file. And indeed there is no such file. There is a file called "configure.ac" instead. I also tried running the "autogen.sh" script, but that doesn't work either. It stays running forever. Do you know a solution for that?

Best,
Leonor
